name: Ace of Tennis
description:
Tennis game to enjoy at the touch of a button

[ Features ]
- Tablet support
- Fully composed vivid 3D graphics
- Realistic tennis game via physical engine!
- Easy to control
- Various Achievement
- Real time Multi-play (Enjoy with online!)
- Ranking system competing against everybody
- Single & Double matches playing with your own cute pet
- Many possible combination of costumes
- Exciting story line
- Get rewards by playing daily missions.
